name: Escape The Labyrinth
description: You are cold and alone, shrouded by darkness. Using your wits and hidden items you must fight for your survival and escape a seemingly endless...
minimum_requirements: OS: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000, GeForce 8800, ATI 1950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible audio device
